Message.Title: Ideas
Message.Msg: Democratic ideas are so good for America that Mitt Romney has decided to steal all those ideas and ride on them.

The latest Democratic idea that showed up last night on Twitter is to shoot Romney if he wins. Shows just how far the libs are taken in by Obama's smoke screen. I suppose the idea of putting a max limit for tax deductions is a Democratic idea.

Message.Title: Chinese currency manipulation hurts companies like KO
Message.Msg: Romney was right on target in that analysis. The proof is in the pudding (earnings I mean!)
